verses.verse: "Do you <S%H2803>think<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> is according to <S%H4941>justice<s%>? Do you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> God's'?

"For you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> <S%H5532>advantage<s%> will it be to You? <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> shall I have, <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> if I had <S%H9128>sinned<s%>?'
"I will <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H4405><s%> you, And your <S%H7453>friends<s%> with you.
<S%H5027>"Look<s%> at the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and <S%H7200>see;<s%> And <S%H7789>behold<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> â€“ they are <S%H1361>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> you.

<S%H518>"If<s%> you have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> do you <S%H6466>accomplish<s%> against Him? And if your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>many,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> do you <S%H6213>do<s%> to Him?
<S%H518>"If<s%> you are <S%H6663>righteous,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> do you <S%H5414>give<s%> to Him? <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> does He <S%H3947>receive<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand<s%>?
"Your <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> is for a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> yourself, And your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is for a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

<S%H4480>"Because<s%> of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> they <S%H2199>cry<s%> out; They <S%H7768>cry<s%> for <S%H7768>help<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7227>mighty.<s%>
"But <S%H3808>no<s%> one <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H346>'Where<s%> is <S%H433>God<s%> my <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%>

Who <S%H502>teaches<s%> us <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And <S%H2449>makes<s%> us <S%H2449>wiser<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>?'
<S%H8033>"There<s%> they <S%H6817>cry<s%> out, but He does not <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>men.<s%>
<S%H389>"Surely<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to an <S%H7723>empty<s%> [cry,] <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H7789>regard<s%> it.

<S%H637>"How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H637>less<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H559>say<s%> you do not <S%H7789>behold<s%> Him, The <S%H1779>case<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, and you must <S%H9123>wait<s%> for Him!
"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> He has not <S%H6485>visited<s%> [in] His <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> has He <S%H3045>acknowledged<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H3966>well,<s%>
